description:
If you are a beginner in the world of PHP, this course is a must for you. You'll learn the basics of PHP in an interesting way with the help of examples and videos. There are quizes to assess your learning. Course is written with a latest concept of illustration and DIY examples. We believe that you'll learn faster when you see it happening. Therefore there are live cases after explanation of every concept. Once you are through the course you'll be able to create modern websites which delivers great results.

There are more than 240 million websites which are created in PHP (as of 2013). Ever wondered what kind of skills are required to create these PHP websites. Yes you can learn all that is required to create amazing websites in this course. Don't loose time,Go ahead and subscribe to the course. Looking forward to see you at the course.
title: Learn PHP at ease - DIY examples , Quizes and Videos
